channel.title: Need help with gfx thing ~~please read~~
channel.description: I added a command for admin + and its a glow thing thats around you...but...it will just glow for a second and then it will stop. is there anyway that i can make it continue and also follow me? i believe i have 317 but not entierly sure...lol any help would be cool. thanks. and to all you asshole haters, i did use the search and google so dont even run your mouth :mad: and thank you to all people that give any help at all and not non sense. much appreciated. :D :D

I added a command for admin + and its a glow thing thats around you…but…it will just glow for a second and then it will stop. is there anyway that i can make it continue and also follow me? i believe i have 317 but not entierly sure…lol any help would be cool. thanks. and to all you asshole haters, i did use the search and google so dont even run your mouth :mad: and thank you to all people that give any help at all and not non sense. much appreciated.
